name: Dab Emoji - Moji Puzzle Games
description:
Dab Emojis are waiting for you to merge! Collect points and unlock more Dab Emojis! You may give them a screenshot so that you can use them during chatting!

Merge 3 of the same Dab Emoji and keep your board clear. Get to the final emoji to clear 9 tiles at once! Can you get the highest score among your friends, unlock and use all the Dab Emojis?
